## utils.dom.removeClass() function

Remove a CSS class from a element. Similar to Closure's goog.dom.classes.remove, except it handles SVG elements.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function removeClass(element: Element, className: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  element | Element | DOM element to remove class from. |
|  className | string | Name of class to remove.  True if class was removed, false if never present.  Blockly.utils.dom.removeClass |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
